title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Revolution: Transforming Governance in Kerala
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Tesla accidentally reveals xAI's meaning: Exploratory Artificial Intelligence
description: Tesla's filing may have accidentally revealed that xAI stands for ‘exploratory artificial intelligence'. However, neither Musk nor the company has officially confirmed this. For now, xAI's mission to build advanced artificial general intelligence (AGI) remains its defining purpose.

title: 67% of engineers say AI is changing their jobs, 85% see upskilling as way forward
description: A latest survey by Great Learning has found that 67% of Indian engineers feel their roles are being reshaped by artificial intelligence. The survey has shown 85% plan to upskill in FY26, favouring short, job-focused programmes.
content: Ahead of Engineers’ Day, Great Learning has released its latest survey showing a striking reality: 67% of Indian engineers believe their roles are already being reshaped by Artificial Intelligence. The findings point to a profession at the centre of ... [3018 chars]
